title: IT Cybersecurity Expert (m/f/d)
body:
IT-EXPERTS WANTED


Motherboard

We, softwareXperts search for our customers from different industries for qualified IT experts with a wide range of know-how.


Infrastructure

Our client is a austrian company in the medical sector.

We are looking for a dedicated and motivated IT Cybersecurity Expert (m/f/d).


Your upgrades

  • An exciting job in a motivated team
  • The unique opportunity for your personal development
  • Latest technological possibilities
  • A dynamic and agile working environment

Your hard- and software

  • IT education (HTL, Fachhochschule, University)
  • Well-grounded experience in risk assessment procedures, policy information, role-based authorization methodologies, authentication technologies and security attack pathologies
  • Well-grounded Know-How of ISO 2700/27002, ITIL and COBIT frameworks
  • Good knowledge of practices and methods of IT strategy, enterprise architecture and security architecutre
  • Good knowledge of third party auditing and cloud risk assessment methodologies
  • Result orientation and willingness to perform
  • Excellent communication and team skills
  • Very good German and English skills

Your tasks

  • Ýou plan, research and design robust security architectures
  • You research security standards, security systems and authentication protocols
  • You prepare cost estimates and identify integration issues
  • You define, implement and maintain corporate IT security policies and procedures
  • You oversee IT security awareness programs and educational efforts in collaboration with the CSO

The minimum salary for this position is € 36.154,- gross per annum, with the willingness to overpay based on your qualifications and experience. If you want to be part of a motivated team and want to contribute to the long-term success of the company, please apply with your reference number 7365 with your application documents.


You are not available - but you know the right person?
Get your reward!
